item.title: About
item.description:
Hi This is Keerthisai! I’m a Shortfilm Maker.

ABOUT THIS WEBSITE:

  • I think having a website is good for connecting and sharing with people

THINGS I DO:

  • Well I’m a Astrologer by profession.
  • Making Videos is my hobby.
  • I can cook too! oh! May be sometimes.
  • I like Making so Many Friends.

CONTACT:

  • If you want to reach me then feel free to hit me up on rathasaradhiproduction@gmail.com.
  • You can also reach me on Instagram at keerthisai_thirukkovalur.
